statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_contact LIKE '+1%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers WHERE customer_address = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, customer_contact FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, status, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, order_date, status FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, issue_description, support_agent FROM customer_support ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;
SELECT cs.ticket_id, cs.issue_description, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM customer_support cs JOIN customers c ON cs.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE cs.support_agent = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 2;
SELECT customer_name, support_date, issue_description FROM Customers JOIN Customer_Support ON Customers.customer_id = Customer_Support.customer_id ORDER BY support_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_email FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE Orders.order_total > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id WHERE Order_Items.quantity > 5;

SELECT customer_name, support_date, issue_description FROM Customers JOIN Customer_Support ON Customers.customer_id = Customer_Support.customer_id WHERE Customer_Support.support_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC, last_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%California%'
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT customer_id, issue_description, status FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open'
